Background and Bio:

I am a recent graduate from the University of Richmond's Robins School of Business. I graduated suma cum laude with a double major in Business Administration and Latin American and Iberian Studies. I am very interested in business development, market research, and customer acquisition. I am completely and totally enthralled with the often hectic, very demanding and constantly changing world of startups and have turned to the Boston Startup School to help cultivate this passion.
